text: S&P 500 touches 7,000 for first time then retreats as traders await Fed decision: Live updates - CNBC

text: Dutch government is ordered to protect residents on Caribbean island of Bonaire from climate change - AP News

text: Five takeaways from IU basketball’s win against Purdue - Inside the Hall
